About

Hola! I'm Kannan Anandakrishnan, working as a Lead Devops Engineer in Zeotap, Bangalore. I have more than 5+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure and 3 years of working in a team handling CI/CD, automations, etc., I'll be sharing my knowledge acquired over these years in this blog. Feel free to reach out to me in my Linkedin - You can find the details in the site footer section.
